ref: 12051 vīdhrá n. ʻ clear sky, sunshine ʼ AV. 2. vīˊdhrya- ʻ relating to the clear sky ʼ VS. 3. *vīdhriya -- . 4. *vaidhriya -- . [*īdhra -- ]
Pa. viddha -- in viddha -- vigatavalāhaka -- dēva -- ʻ a clear sky without clouds ʼ;
Kal. bitř, obl. bidūna ʻ clear sky ʼ;
K. vẹ̆dar f. ʻ freezing cold (after a fall of snow, with a clear sky and bitter wind) ʼ;
Ku. bido ʻ bright, sunny, fine ʼ, bid dyo ʻ clear sky ʼ =
N. bāsi -- bido ʻ cessation of the Rains ʼ (ND 443 a 25 wrongly).
